creator: wobbler
title: The Galvani-Edison Luminiferous Aether Disturbance Generator
materials_required: Brass holder for an Aether Disturber with a Galvanic energy controller
description: This project details the construction of a Galvani-Edison Luminiferous Aether Disturbance Generator, a device designed to create disturbances in the luminiferous aether using galvanic energy. The device uses a combination of brass fittings, a protective glass dome, and an LED-based aether disturber to produce and control the aetheric effects.  The creator warns of potential dangers associated with galvanic energy and the unknown long-term effects of aether disturbances.
steps: Collect the necessary parts including a brass holder for an Aether Disturber, a BEGÅVNING glass dome, Galvanic wire connectors, a Galvanic Energy Variable Flow Restrictor, an LED Aether Disturber, and a wooden mounting base.
Mount the brass Aether Disturber holder centrally on the brass base, drilling holes for the holder and the Galvanic Energy Variable Flow Restrictor.
Drill extra holes around the rim of the brass base to allow it to be attached to a wooden plinth, which serves as a stable base and provides protection.

Install the Galvanic Energy Flow Restrictor by cutting the protective cover on the Galvanic cable to the Aether Disturber holder and splicing the Restrictor cables into the "live"/brown cable using two-way lever wire connectors.
Drill a large center hole in the wooden bowl and a smaller hole in the side to route the Galvanic energy conductor through to a suitable plug.
Feed the Galvanic energy conductor through the holes in the wooden bowl and mount the brass base onto the bottom of the upside down wooden bowl. Insert the Aether Disturber in its holder.
Connect the device to a Galvanic energy source.
With the protective cover removed, turn on the Aether Disturber holder.
Test the Galvanic Energy Flow Restrictor by rotating the control dial to observe variance in the luminous aether disturbance.
Replace the BEGÅVNING (Safety) Glass dome for safe operation.
